1.text: Separate the yolks and whites of 3 eggs between 2 bowls.

2.text: Add salt and pepper to the yolks and beat them with a fork.

3.text: Whisk the egg whites until they form stiff peaks.

4.text: Fold the egg yolks into the stiff egg whites.

5.text: Melt 1 tablespoon (15 g) of butter in a nonstick skillet.

6.text: Spread the egg mixture in the skillet.

7.text: Cover the skillet and cook the omelette for 4 minutes.

8.text: Scatter cheese over the omelette and cook it for 1 more minute.

9.text: Slide the omelette onto a plate and fold it over in half.

10.text: Substitute your favorite type of cheese for the Gruyère or cheddar.

11.text: Add a spoonful of dairy to the egg yolks for an extra creamy flavor.

12.text: Stir herbs into the yolks to lighten the flavor of the omelette.

13.text: Top the cooked omelette with vegetables or meat before you fold it.
